name: Draper
description:
Draper is a classic design inspired by the iconic parsons table. By shaving as much bulk as possible we give the table a very slim physic. As we stretched the table we were able to give you eight different points of view at dinner, in a small foot print. Seen here in quarter sawn white oak.

dims. 
84_39_29

name: Rokur
description:
An updated take on the rocking chair. A minimalists version of an iconic symbol. The design was an attempt to capture the look and feel of relaxation. By removing extraneous patterns and ornate fillers, we created a chair that is as beautiful as it is functional. Rocking chairs are not about the loud energetic things in life, they are for the reflective times. The design echoes that calm refined moment when you get to just sit and think. Whether it be a spring time afternoon nap or a 2 am feeding of a hungry newborn. The Rokur will not distract from what matters. 

Rokur seen here in Brazilian cherry. Also offered with seat and/or back cushions at an additional charge.

dims.
22_31_34

Please contact for pricing. Choice of material will dictate price.

name: Silhouette
description:
Silhouette is a double agent of comfort. It looks and fits like a classic armchair, as well if the mood strikes you, it becomes a rocking chair. With just a slightest of rocking ability, you can lull yourself into relaxation.

Made from 6000 series aluminum and a steel seat and back. This chair will be there to comfort you for years to come. With many color options to choose from.
